backend/main.mo: Motoko actor handling access control, user profiles, and audio metadata submission and retrieval with admin‑gated approval flow.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file summarizing each frontend source file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions with extensive OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, profile loading, and routing between welcome, profile setup, and dashboard views.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin interface for reviewing audio submissions, approving or rejecting them, and viewing artist profiles.
frontend/src/components/CreatorZoneTab.t: Form for creators to submit audio metadata for admin approval with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing Studio and Creator Zone tabs and conditionally the admin panel based on role.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding and links, including a caffeine.ai attribution icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with user auth state, profile dropdown, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Provides a form for creating a user profile with display name and saves it via mutation.
frontend/src/components/StudioTab.tsx: Shows approved audio items with duration and premium labels, including loading and empty states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, managing login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, audio submissions, and admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme variables and base styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, typography, container queries, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s current state, versioning, and a list of pending feature requests for the VAANI backend and workflow.
